System.out.println("Connecting to "Server Name""); Serverip = "127.0.0.1"; //Serverip = "127.0.0.1"; //launchURL("http://www.google.com"); sign.signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getByName(Serverip));

item.title: Other people can't log in?
item.dc:creator: @daygen4545 daygen4545
item.description:
@daygen4545 wrote:

i have set up a host at no-ip, and portforwarded with windows firewall, but where do i change that the server is connecting to 127.0.0.1 to my ip?

Here is what i thought could be it

if (/* connectingHost.startsWith(“localhost”) || connectingHost.equals(“127.0.0.1”)*/true) {
